titles.title: For the relief of Lawrence E. Hall, Jr. and Nancy T. Hall.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 9/5/1997--Introduced. Waives the time limitation regarding commencement of civil actions against the United States with respect to any claims by two named individuals arising out of the mortgage held by the Department of Agriculture on their home in Massachusetts. Bars the Department from foreclosing upon the mortgage until the later of one year after the enactment of this Act or the final resolution of claims submitted within one year after such enactment.
